content.rendered:
Undergraduate Appeal Form – Organizational login is required

  • This is our new undergraduate appeals form that is an online submission form and has replaced the old cover sheets.
 Transcript Requests:

  • You can now order your transcript through National Student Clearinghouse.
  • Mail in Request – Transcript Request Form

General Forms

  • Application for Graduation
  • Certificate Program Completion
  • Change Major/Catalog Form (ROC/CAPA)
  • Change Major/Minor/Catalog (Main Campus Traditional)
  • Create Your Own Major
  • Directed Study
  • Duplicate/Replacement Diploma Order
  • Grade Option Form – Organizational login is required
  • Graduate Concentration Change
  • Independent Study Form
  • Major-Course-Substitution or Waiver
  • Major Contract (For use when student-requested Major is not listed in the Catalog)
  • Minor Contract (For use when student-requested Minor is not listed in the Catalog)
  • Name Change/Correction Form
  • Privacy Request Form
  • Registration Change
  • Request to:
    • Challenge a Course
    • Enroll in Graduate Level Courses
    • Enrollment/Degree Verification – Organizational login is required
    • Photo ID – Organizational login is required
    • Retrieve Your Student ID Number
  • Third Party Authorization Form (FERPA)
  • Withdrawal/Leave of Absence

Non-matriculated Status Enrollment:

    • Non-Matriculated Student
